Text.Page:
, I'm Launa from the Guardian Legion.

Interested in doing some flying?
The federation has been looking for heroes that can handle some flight missions.
If you'd like to help out, I'm in Velika. Come talk to me.

Good to see you.

Things have been pretty hectic these days with the usual federation issues, and now we're starting to discover threats coming from the air.
We can barely cover the ground areas, but there are still aerial areas that need to be guarded.

Any chance you want to help us out?"You've got my attention."

Then, let's do a quick test first. If you have the potential for aerial combat, I'll let you participate in a special flight mission.

The stakes are high, but if you succeed you'll be hailed as a hero. That's worth the risk, right?

There are five essences around the Freedom Plaza. Collect them all and bring them back here, understood?

Now, get ready... and go!

Wow, better than expected!

We shouldn't waste a second with this great ability.

Alright. Since you have proven yourself worthy, you can officially help us search the skies.

Participate in any flight mission, get some satisfactory results and come talk to me again. Understood?

Amazing, !

Thanks to you, the skies are much safer now. Maybe now we can concentrate on more important issues.

Hope to see you fly again soon!
